item.title: An introduction to Magit, an Emacs mode for Git
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction Magit is arguably the best Git tool out there and also my favorite. It is a package in Emacs, and it is text based. Magit init, commit and commit messages Init create a repositories from a floder SPC g i(magit-init) Add all of files to staged SPC u S Checking staged files changed contect Move cursor to staged files, click TAB check what is changed Commit c c then use c-c c-c to finish commit
